verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:5
verses.text: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath–shua the daughter of Ammiel:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:6
verses.text: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:7
verses.text: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:8
verses.text: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:9
verses.text: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:10
verses.text: And Solomon’s son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:11
verses.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:12
verses.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 3:13
verses.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
